The causal sequence of the ending of suf: When their relishing ceases, grasping ceases.
When grasping ceases, continued existence ceases.
When continued existence ceases, rebirth ceases.
When rebirth ceases, old age and death, sorrow, lamentation, pain, sadness, and distress cease.
The brief statement on freedom through t: Mendicants should memorize that brief statement on freedom through the ending of craving.
